## 9. Security Considerations

If this issue relates to a potential vulnerability:

- Do not include credentials, tokens, or sensitive data.
- Do not disclose production information.
- Consider responsible disclosure practices when appropriate.

If the issue involves a real-world vulnerability affecting external systems, contact the maintainer directly instead of publishing sensitive details.
